short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enchanting gateway with Mystical Aura

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring a stunning mystical forest background, a sleek real-time clock, and weather updates tailored to your location, this extension brings a sense of wonder to your browsing experience. Customize your tab to match your mood and stay connected with time and weather at a glance. Let the magic inspire your day.
